name: nanonets

description.integration: Automate document processing & data extraction workflows for document-heavy business processes like accounts payable, order processing & insurance.

documentation: ## Nanonets Use the Nanonets OCR to perform text extraction from images and documents. This AI-powered OCR automates document processing, making it useful for invoices, receipts, ID verification, and contracts. ### Requirements To use the Nanonets OCR, you need: - A Nanonets account. - An API Key from Nanonets (available in your account settings). ### Supported Authentication Methods **Basic Authentication** ### Features - AI-based OCR with high accuracy - Custom model training for domain-specific OCR - Support for multiple file formats - RESTful API for easy integration - Multi-language support - Exponential backoff for rate limits and retries ### Getting Started #### Create an Account & Get API Key 1. Sign up at Nanonets. 2. Navigate to the API dashboard. 3. Get your API Key from the settings page. ### Supported File Formats - **Images**: JPEG / JPG, PNG, TIFF / TIF, BMP, GIF - **Documents**: PDF (multi-page supported) ### Use Cases - Invoice & Receipt Processing - Automated ID Verification - Document Digitization - Bank Statements & Financial Reports ### Support - Nanonets Documentation - Sign Up for Free For more detailed instructions on setting up your Hugging Face integration, refer to the Boltic documentation or contact Boltic support.

ai_description.integration: The Nanonets activity automates document processing and data extraction in workflows for document-heavy business processes such as accounts payable, order processing, and insurance by utilizing Optical Character Recognition (OCR) and Intelligent Document Processing, making it ideal for scenarios requiring efficient and accurate data extraction from various document types.
